# Belpre Township, Edwards County, Kansas

|postal_code_type         =
|postal_code              =

Belpre Township is a township in Edwards County, Kansas, United States.  As of the 2000 census, its population was 186.
Geography
Belpre Township covers an area of  and contains one incorporated settlement, Belpre.
